sentences: Nikki Bacólod (born Monique Echieverri Bacólod on August 18, 1989), is a Filipina singer, television host, swimmer and actress.
She is best known for placing as first runner up in the 2005 season of ABS-CBN's Search for the Star in a Million.
As a result of her placing, she won a recording contract under VIVA Records, and thereafter released two albums, In Full Bloom and Not That Kind of Girl.
Of All the Things as Princess Pamintuan
2010: Babe, I Love You as KengKeng
2009: You Changed My Life as Beng
Ang Cute Ng Ina Mo as Lisa
2008 Metro Manila Film Festival nominated for "Best Supporting Actress" from the movie "Baler".
